TopicTitle: [Mod Request] Real Progression without Realism Overhaul

Articles.Content:
I really like Real Fuels Stockalike with RSS, and i want to play them in career mode. There is RP-0 which is only for RO. I would like if someone could make RP-0 for Real Fuels Stockalike and not RO, because i have no idea how to code or make mods. Anyone interested in this mod?

Edited February 9, 2016 by Joco223
